DOC.brief_summary: Recruited patient symptomatic irreversible pulpitis assign interventional ( XP Endo Finisher file ) control group ( ultrasonic activate irrigation ) undergo single visit endodontic treatment record postoperative pain afterwards .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of XP Endo Finisher Versus Ultrasonic Activated Irrigation On Post-operative Pain In Endodontic Treatment Symptomatic Irreversible Pulpitis
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator recruit patient clinic endodontics faculty oral dental medicine , Cairo university . The patient find eligible criterion , randomly assign either control group ( ultrasonic activate irrigation ) intervention group ( XP Endo-Finisher file ) . Endodontic treatment do single visit . After visit , patient ask record post operative pain NRS ( Numerical Rate Scale ) give sheet .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Medically free systemic disease 2 . Male female 3 . Patients age range 2545 4 . Symptomatic irreversible pulpitis single root single canal teeth without apical periodontitis . 5 . Teeth mature root 6 . Restorable teeth 7 . Teeth without calcified root canal 8 . Teeth without root caries 9 . Teeth without internal external root resorption 10 . Teeth sign crack formation 11 . Teeth without anatomic abnormality 1 . Pregnant female . 2 . If analgesic administrate past two week preoperatively . 3 . Patients bruxism clench . 4 . Multi root multi canal teeth . 5 . Patients swell acute periapical abscess . 6 . Previously endodontically treat teeth 7. periodontally affected teeth .
